short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will show you deals from other websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
B2B Deal Hunter is a powerful Chrome extension created to enhance the browsing experience of business professionals by bringing relevant business-to-business deals right to their fingertips. As users navigate through the web, the extension intelligently fetches and displays a curated list of exclusive deals tailored to the specific website they are visiting. The provided deals are from a variety of reputable service providers, allowing users to discover great offers and promotions without having to search for them manually.

The extension is designed with a simple, user-friendly interface, making it easy for users to view and navigate through the available deals. Each deal is presented with a brief description and a link to the offer, providing users with all the necessary information at a glance. Additionally, the extension ensures a non-disruptive user experience by displaying deals in a non-intrusive manner.

Whether you're a startup founder, a small business owner, or a corporate executive, B2B Deal Hunter is an invaluable tool that helps you save time, discover new services, and take advantage of the best business-to-business deals on the web. Install B2B Deal Hunter today and start enjoying a more productive and rewarding browsing experience!

You can find the Privacy Policy here: https://b2bdealhunter.com/#privacy
